docs.title: Welcome to LR Consultancy
docs.text:
Empowering organizations to operationalize standards with clarity, empathy, and audit-readiness.

LR Consultancy specializes in social responsibility, ISO, security, and sustainability programs. We help teams transform compliance into culture—bridging global standards with practical, team-friendly documentation.

docs.title: 🔍 What We Do
docs.text:
• ISO Systems: ISO 9001, ISO 14001
  • Social Responsibility: SMETA, WRAP, SLCP
  • Security & Risk: RBA, C-TPAT, FACC
  • Sustainability: Higg FEM

We design modular, audit-ready knowledge bases that empower process owners and streamline onboarding. Our documentation systems are built for reproducibility, traceability, and visual clarity.

docs.title: 🚀 Why It Matters
docs.text: In a world of shifting expectations and evolving standards, we help organizations stay resilient, transparent, and audit-ready. Our approach harmonizes evidence with empathy—making compliance not just achievable, but sustainable.

docs.title: 📁 Explore the Knowledge Base
docs.text: Navigate through our program-specific guides, cheat sheets, and onboarding materials. Each section is designed to support contributors, auditors, and process owners alike.

docs.title: 🌱 Our Mission
docs.text:
To make standards practical, accessible, and empowering—so that organizations can thrive with integrity and confidence.

We believe that documentation should be more than a checklist. It should be a living system that reflects your values, supports your teams, and prepares you for every audit with clarity and purpose.

docs.title: 🧠 Our Approach
docs.text:
• Operational Empathy: We design systems that work for real people in real workflows.
  • Modular Documentation: Scalable folder trees, contributor onboarding, and retention policies.
  • Audit Traceability: Metadata bridges public standards and private evidence.
  • Visual Design: Logos, banners, and color accents that make compliance memorable.

docs.title: 🛠️ Tools We Use
docs.text:
• MkDocs + Material Theme
  • GitHub Pages
  • PowerShell Automation
  • VS Code + GitHub Desktop

docs.title: 🤝 Work With Us
docs.text:
Whether you're preparing for a dual-standard audit or building a new compliance program from scratch, LR Consultancy is here to help. We bring structure, insight, and creativity to every engagement.

docs.title: ISO 9001: Operational Excellence in Action
docs.text: ISO 9001 isn’t just a checklist—it’s a mindset. This module helps teams translate quality principles into daily behaviors, with traceable evidence and contributor-friendly workflows.

docs.title: 🔍 What You'll Find Here
docs.text:
• Modular procedures with embedded metadata
